skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baseball quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
⚾ Baseball Quiz – The Ultimate Trivia Game for Baseball Fans! ⚾

Step up to the plate and test your baseball knowledge with "Baseball Quiz," the Alexa Skill that brings the excitement of the ballpark into your home. Answer fun "yes" or "no" trivia questions and see if you can score a home run of knowledge! 🧢⚾

⚾ SINGLE PLAYER MODE ⚾
• Answer baseball-themed questions with a simple "yes" or "no."
• Earn points: 1 point for every correct answer!
• Check your score: Say "stop" at any time to hear your accumulated points.
• Automatic updates: Alexa will announce your total score after every 10 questions.

⚾⚾ MULTIPLAYER MODE ⚾⚾
• Challenge your friends or family: Play with up to 4 players!
• Leaderboard updates: Scores are revealed every 20 questions to show who’s leading.
• Learn as you play: Alexa now provides an explanation for every incorrect answer, so you can boost your baseball IQ!
• Missed a question? Say "repeat," and Alexa will replay it for you.

🧢 NEW FEATURES 🧢
• Learn and Play: Wrong answer? Alexa explains the correct one to help you learn.
• Repeat Intent: Didn’t catch the question? Simply ask Alexa to repeat it.

⚾ WHY PLAY BASEBALL QUIZ? ⚾

• Test your baseball knowledge, from legendary players to iconic moments and team stats.
• Compete with your friends and family to find out who’s the ultimate baseball trivia champion.
• Perfect for game nights, tailgate parties, or just passing the time between innings.
So, grab your bat and step into the batter’s box—play Baseball Quiz today and show off your skills! 🥎

📱HOW TO ADD BASEBALL QUIZ TO AN ALEXA ROUTINE📱
Open the Alexa app on your mobile device.
Go to the menu and select Routines.
Tap the + icon in the top right corner.
Choose When This Happens and set your trigger (like a specific time or voice command).
Select Add Skill and choose Baseball Quiz.
Assign the routine to your Alexa device and tap Create.

Hit a grand slam of fun and knowledge today!
priv:
